entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
